overview: Elthor, the prince of Bedwill, is captured during a city invasion and taken to a mysterious place. He must find out who did this and where he is. In his journey, he makes a lot of discoveries and meets a lot of different people and creatures.
tagline: Elthor, the prince of Bedwill, is captured during a city invasion and taken to a mysterious place. He must find out who did this and where he is. In his journey, he makes a lot of discoveries and meets a lot of different people and creatures.
title: Melvik
